price: 19. Puis, ingrat (comme tu l’étais), tu commis le forfait que tu sais. »[364]
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: [364] Le peuple de Pharaon reproche à Moïse d’avoir tué un Égyptien en prenant la défense d’un Juif.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
